description: Also called casualty, this deals with ambulance emergencies. If anyone has suffered from a trauma or accident or gets badly injured, this department is where they are taken to get evaluated. This is where a patient is stabilized first.
message_clean: Also called casualty this deals with ambulance emergencies If anyone has suffered from a trauma or accident or gets badly injured this department is where they are taken to get evaluated This is where a patient is stabilized first

description: Responsible for anaesthetics after operation, pain relief after operation, chronic pain relief in conditions such as arthritis, critical pain management obstetric anesthesia and analgesia(epidural in childbirth and Cartesian section)
message_clean: Responsible for anaesthetics after operation pain relief after operation chronic pain relief in conditions such as arthritis critical pain management obstetric anesthesia and analgesiaepidural in childbirth and Cartesian section

description: This unit screens women for breast cancer,breast abnormalities either through routine mammogram examinations or at the request of doctors. It's usually linked to an X-ray department.
message_clean: This unit screens women for breast cancerbreast abnormalities either through routine mammogram examinations or at the request of doctors Its usually linked to an Xray department

description: Deals with heart, circulation or vascular issues. Procedures include electrocardiogram(ECG) , echocardiogram, scan of the carotid artery in neck to determine stroke risk, blood pressure tests, pacemaker insertion, cardiac catheterization(coronary angiography) to check block in arteries, problem with aorta.
message_clean: Deals with heart circulation or vascular issues Procedures include electrocardiogramECG  echocardiogram scan of the carotid artery in neck to determine stroke risk blood pressure tests pacemaker insertion cardiac catheterizationcoronary angiography to check block in arteries problem with aorta

description: Chaplains promote the spiritual and pastoral wellbeing of patients, relatives and staff.They are available to all members of staff for confidential counsel and support irrespective of religion or race. A hospital chapel is also usually available.
message_clean: Chaplains promote the spiritual and pastoral wellbeing of patients relatives and staffThey are available to all members of staff for confidential counsel and support irrespective of religion or race A hospital chapel is also usually available

description: Deals with general ear, nose and throat diseases neck lumps cancers of the head and neck area tear duct problems facial skin lesions balance and hearing disorders snoring and sleep apnea ENT allergy problems salivary gland diseases voice disorders.
message_clean: Deals with general ear nose and throat diseases neck lumps cancers of the head and neck area tear duct problems facial skin lesions balance and hearing disorders snoring and sleep apnea ENT allergy problems salivary gland diseases voice disorders

description: Specialising in geriatric medicine, this department looks after problems associated with the elderly. This includes:stroke medicine, gastroenterology, diabetes, locomotor (movement) problems,continence problems, syncope (fainting), bone disease.It also has close links with community services for the elderly.
message_clean: Specialising in geriatric medicine this department looks after problems associated with the elderly This includesstroke medicine gastroenterology diabetes locomotor movement problemscontinence problems syncope fainting bone diseaseIt also has close links with community services for the elderly

description: The gastroenterology unit deals in digestive system including Mouth.Pharynx.Oesophagus.Stomach.Intestines. Small intestine. Duodenum. Jejunum. Ileum. Large intestine. Cecum. Colon.Rectum.Anus.Liver.Specialising in bowel-related medicine, upper and lower gastrointestinal diseases,pancreas, bile duct inflammatory bowel and swallowing problems.

description: The general surgery ward covers a wide range of surgery and includes:day surgery,thyroid surgery,kidney transplants,colon surgery,laparoscopic cholecystectomy (gallbladder removal),endoscopy,breast surgery.Day surgery units have minor surgical procedures such as hernia repairs.
message_clean: The general surgery ward covers a wide range of surgery and includesday surgerythyroid surgerykidney transplantscolon surgerylaparoscopic cholecystectomy gallbladder removalendoscopybreast surgeryDay surgery units have minor surgical procedures such as hernia repairs

description: These departments investigate and treat gynecological problems of the female urinary tract and reproductive organs(Vagina.Cervix.Uterus.Fallopian tube.Ovaries.) such as endometritis, infertility and incontinence, cervical smear screening and post-menopausal bleeding checks.
message_clean: These departments investigate and treat gynecological problems of the female urinary tract and reproductive organsVaginaCervixUterusFallopian tubeOvaries such as endometritis infertility and incontinence cervical smear screening and postmenopausal bleeding checks

description: Haematology deals in problems related to Red blood cells (erythrocytes), White blood cells (leukocytes)-( Lymphocytes.Monocytes.Eosinophils.Basophils.Neutrophils (granulocytes).) Platelets (thrombocytes),Plasma, haemoglobin. These doctors treat blood diseases,infectionsand malignancies linked to the blood.
message_clean: Haematology deals in problems related to Red blood cells erythrocytes White blood cells leukocytes LymphocytesMonocytesEosinophilsBasophilsNeutrophils granulocytes Platelets thrombocytesPlasma haemoglobin These doctors treat blood diseasesinfectionsand malignancies linked to the blood

description: Women now have a choice of who leads their maternity care in cases of pregnancy and childbirth. Maternity wards provide antenatal care, care during childbirth and postnatal support. Antenatal clinics provide monitoring for both routine and complicated pregnancies.
message_clean: Women now have a choice of who leads their maternity care in cases of pregnancy and childbirth Maternity wards provide antenatal care care during childbirth and postnatal support Antenatal clinics provide monitoring for both routine and complicated pregnancies

description: The microbiology department looks at all aspects of microbiology, such as bacterial and viral infections. They have become increasingly high profile following the rise of hospital-acquired infections, such as MRSA and C. Difficile.
message_clean: The microbiology department looks at all aspects of microbiology such as bacterial and viral infections They have become increasingly high profile following the rise of hospitalacquired infections such as MRSA and C Difficile

description: Neonatal units provide for intensive, high-dependency and special care for newborn babies. It always maintains close links with the hospital maternity department, in the interest of newborn babies and their families.They have the philosophy that, whenever possible, mother and baby should be together.
message_clean: Neonatal units provide for intensive highdependency and special care for newborn babies It always maintains close links with the hospital maternity department in the interest of newborn babies and their familiesThey have the philosophy that whenever possible mother and baby should be together

description: This unit deals with disorders of the nervous system, including the brain,spinal cord,neuron,spanial canal, cranial cavity,meninges,dura mater,grey matter, white matter, ganglia,vertebrae .Specialist nurses (epilepsy, multiple sclerosis) liaise with patients, consultants and GPs to provide care.
message_clean: This unit deals with disorders of the nervous system including the brainspinal cordneuronspanial canal cranial cavitymeningesdura matergrey matter white matter gangliavertebrae Specialist nurses epilepsy multiple sclerosis liaise with patients consultants and GPs to provide care

description: The department works across a wide range of specialities such as:diabetes,food and eating disorder,cancer,kidney problems,paediatrics,elderly care,surgery and critical care,gastroenterology. They also provide group education to patients with diabetes, heart disease and osteoarthritis, and work closely with weight management groups.
message_clean: The department works across a wide range of specialities such asdiabetesfood and eating disordercancerkidney problemspaediatricselderly caresurgery and critical caregastroenterology They also provide group education to patients with diabetes heart disease and osteoarthritis and work closely with weight management groups

description: These units provide maternity services such as:antenatal and postnatal care,prenatal diagnosis unit,maternal and foetal surveillance. Overseen by consultant obstetricians and gynaecologists, Care can include colposcopy, laser therapy or hysteroscopy for abnormal cervical cells,psychosexual counselling,recurrent miscarriage unit,early pregnancy unit.

description: This department provides radiotherapy and a full range of chemotherapy treatments for cancerous tumours and blood disorders.Staffed by specialist doctors and nurses trained in oncology (cancer care), it has close links with surgical and medical teams in other departments.
message_clean: This department provides radiotherapy and a full range of chemotherapy treatments for cancerous tumours and blood disordersStaffed by specialist doctors and nurses trained in oncology cancer care it has close links with surgical and medical teams in other departments

description: Some common diseases they deal in include diseases to iris,cornea,pupil,optic nerve,choroid,sclera, fovea,ciliary body,vitreous humor,Refractive Errors,Glaucoma,Cataract,Age-Related Macular Degeneration,Amblyopia,Diabetic Retinopathy,Retinal Detachment or Tear.Dry Eye Syndrome,Squint.They also provide sight testing.

description: Orthopaedic departments treat your musculoskeletal  problems  ; That's your muscles, joints, bones, ligaments, tendons and nerves.They deal with everything from setting bone fractures and dislocations  to surgery to correct torn ligaments,hip replacements and soft tissue injuries.
message_clean: Orthopaedic departments treat your musculoskeletal  problems   Thats your muscles joints bones ligaments tendons and nervesThey deal with everything from setting bone fractures and dislocations  to surgery to correct torn ligamentship replacements and soft tissue injuries

description: Physiotherapists promote body healing, for example after surgery, through therapies such as exercise,massage and manipulation. Their services are provided to patients on the wards, in the physiotherapy department itself and in rehabilitation units.Physiotherapists often work closely with orthopedic teams.
message_clean: Physiotherapists promote body healing for example after surgery through therapies such as exercisemassage and manipulation Their services are provided to patients on the wards in the physiotherapy department itself and in rehabilitation unitsPhysiotherapists often work closely with orthopedic teams

description: Run by a combination of consultant doctors and specially trained radiotherapists, this department provides radiotherapy (X-ray) treatment for conditions such as malignant tumors and cancer. They may provide palliative services related to cancer in consultation with oncology department.
message_clean: Run by a combination of consultant doctors and specially trained radiotherapists this department provides radiotherapy Xray treatment for conditions such as malignant tumors and cancer They may provide palliative services related to cancer in consultation with oncology department

description: Closely linked with nephrology teams at hospitals, these units provide haemodialysis treatment for patients with kidney(renal) failure. Many of these patients are on waiting lists for a kidney transplant.They also provide facilities for peritoneal dialysis and help facilitate home haemodialysis.
message_clean: Closely linked with nephrology teams at hospitals these units provide haemodialysis treatment for patients with kidneyrenal failure Many of these patients are on waiting lists for a kidney transplantThey also provide facilities for peritoneal dialysis and help facilitate home haemodialysis

description: Specialist doctors called rheumatologists run the unit and are experts in the field of musculoskeletal disorders (bones, joints, ligaments, tendons, muscles and nerves).Their role is to diagnose conditions and recommend appropriate treatment, if necessary from the orthopaedic department.
message_clean: Specialist doctors called rheumatologists run the unit and are experts in the field of musculoskeletal disorders bones joints ligaments tendons muscles and nervesTheir role is to diagnose conditions and recommend appropriate treatment if necessary from the orthopaedic department

description: This department provides advice, testing and treatment for all sexually transmitted infections (STIs) including Human papillomavirus infection,Genital Herpes, Chlamydia, Gonorrhea, HIV(AIDS),Syphillis and pregnancy testing and advice.It also provides care for pregnancy testing, other sexual and genital problems.
message_clean: This department provides advice testing and treatment for all sexually transmitted infections STIs including Human papillomavirus infectionGenital Herpes Chlamydia Gonorrhea HIVAIDSSyphillis and pregnancy testing and adviceIt also provides care for pregnancy testing other sexual and genital problems

description: The urology department deals in urinary tract, male reproductive system, prostate,diseases affecting the bladder, urethra, ureters, kidneys, and adrenal glands, along with the epididymis, penis, prostate, seminal vesicles and testes specifically in men
message_clean: The urology department deals in urinary tract male reproductive system prostatediseases affecting the bladder urethra ureters kidneys and adrenal glands along with the epididymis penis prostate seminal vesicles and testes specifically in men
